meanings.definition: A congenital condition in which a body part is turned inside out.
meanings.sent1: The doctors were discussing the rare case of exstrophies in the newborn baby.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a special unit for treating exstrophies in children.
meanings.sent3: Despite the seriousness of exstrophies, the baby managed to giggle during the examination.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it had exstrophies, turned inside out by the unexpected news.
meanings.sent5: The image of the inverted organ in exstrophies haunted the surgeon's dreams.
